org.jetel.graph

Class DirectEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.EdgeBase
      • org.jetel.graph.DirectEdge

  • public class DirectEdge
extends EdgeBase
    A class that represents DirectEdge - data connection between two NODEs.
    This Edge is in-memory buffered for better performance, however the buffer is limited in size - the size is determined by Defaults.Data.DIRECT_EDGE_INTERNAL_BUFFER_SIZE constant.
    Since:
    April 2, 2002
    See Also:
    InputPort, OutputPort
